statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, first_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'thermostat' = 'Nest';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'lights' @> '["kitchen"]';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices ->> 'lights' = 'on';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'locks' ->> 'front_door' = 'unlocked';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'security_camera' IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices @> '{"thermostat": "Ecobee", "lights": ["living_room", "kitchen"]}';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'lights' ? 'kitchen';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices -> 'locks' @> '{"front_door": "locked", "back_door": "unlocked"}';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1985-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 10 OR user_id = 15;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM user_profiles WHERE jsonb_array_length(smart_home_devices) > 0 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name ILIKE 'mar%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE date_of_birth >= '1970-01-01' AND date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT email) FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, jsonb_pretty(smart_home_devices) AS formatted_devices FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE jsonb_typeof(smart_home_devices) = 'array';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name NOT LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS max_dob, MIN(date_of_birth) AS min_dob FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'Bob';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM user_profiles WHERE smart_home_devices @> '{"type": "light", "room": "living_room"}' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = (SELECT MAX(user_id) FROM user_profiles);
SELECT user_id, jsonb_array_elements(smart_home_devices) AS device FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'Alice');
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = 'online';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat';
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = 'offline';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'lightbulb';
SELECT full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'security_camera';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = 'offline' AND user_id = 4;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_status = 'offline' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT user_id, device_name, device_status FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, device_name, device_status FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS num_devices FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) AS num_devices FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat');
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE smart_home_devices.user_id = user_profiles.user_id);
SELECT user_id, MAX(device_id) AS max_device_id FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, MIN(device_id) AS min_device_id FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT full_name, COUNT(*) AS num_devices FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id GROUP BY user_profiles.full_name;
SELECT user_id, MIN(device_id) AS min_device_id, MAX(device_id) AS max_device_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE user_id = 3 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_type, MAX(device_id) AS latest_device_id FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT user_id, device_name, device_status FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, phone_number, device_name, device_type, device_status FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, full_name, COUNT(*) AS num_devices FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, AVG(device_id) AS avg_device_id FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_name, AVG(device_id) AS avg_device_id FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT user_id FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM device_settings;
SELECT setting_id, device_id, setting_name FROM device_settings;
SELECT setting_value FROM device_settings;
SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name, device_settings.setting_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.email, devices.device_name, device_settings.setting_name, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_name, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id LEFT JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id RIGHT JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id FULL JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id INNER JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_type, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id OUTER JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM devices);
SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name FROM users LEFT JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name FROM users RIGHT JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM devices GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM devices GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name, device_settings.setting_name, device_settings.setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT users.first_name, devices.device_name, COUNT(*) AS setting_count FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id GROUP BY users.first_name, devices.device_name;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id WHERE setting_name = 'brightness';

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE '%phone%';
SELECT users.first_name, users.email, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM users LEFT JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id GROUP BY users.first_name, users.email;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users UNION SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users INTERSECT SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users EXCEPT SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM (SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users) AS subquery WHERE user_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_model FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT profile_id, full_name, address FROM user_profiles;
SELECT profile_id, address FROM user_profiles WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM device_ownership;
SELECT ownership_id, user_id FROM device_ownership;
SELECT ownership_id, ownership_date FROM device_ownership WHERE ownership_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;
SELECT user_profiles.full_name, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM user_profiles JOIN device_ownership ON user_profiles.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;

SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;

SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN (smart_home_devices JOIN device_ownership ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_ownership.device_id) ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;
SELECT users.username AS user_name, smart_home_devices.device_type AS device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id WHERE device_ownership.ownership_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE smart_home_devices.device_type = 'Thermostat';

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE users.age > 40;
SELECT user_profiles.full_name, user_profiles.address FROM user_profiles;

SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;

SELECT users.username, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id WHERE device_ownership.ownership_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type, device_ownership.ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id WHERE device_ownership.ownership_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE smart_home_devices.device_type IN ('Camera', 'Speaker');

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, smart_home_devices.device_type FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN user_profiles ON users.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE user_profiles.address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices, users.username FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(device_ownership.ownership_id) AS total_ownership FROM users JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING total_ownership > 5;

SELECT users.username, COUNT(device_ownership.ownership_id) AS total_ownership FROM users JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username HAVING COUNT(device_ownership.ownership_id) > 3;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, MIN(device_ownership.ownership_date) AS first_ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, MAX(device_ownership.ownership_date) AS last_ownership_date FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, AVG(device_ownership.ownership_id) AS avg_ownership_id FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT users.username, user_profiles.full_name, SUM(device_ownership.user_id) AS total_users FROM users JOIN smart_home_devices ON users.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_ownership ON users.user_id = device_ownership.user_id GROUP BY users.username;

SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices;

SELECT function_name, description FROM device_functions;

SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings;
SELECT * FROM device_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT function_id, function_name, description FROM device_functions WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%brightness%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_devices FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT AVG(log_id) AS avg_log_id FROM device_logs;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth FROM user_profiles;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, user_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT function_id, function_name, description, device_id FROM device_functions WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT setting_id, setting_name, setting_value, device_id FROM device_settings WHERE setting_value LIKE '%on%';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message, device_id FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth, device_name, device_type FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id;

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, date_of_birth, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, function_name FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, setting_name, setting_value FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, log_timestamp, log_message FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;

SELECT full_name, email, device_name, function_name, setting_name, setting_value, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, device_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, device_name, device_type, function_name FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, device_name, device_type, setting_name, setting_value FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id WHERE setting_value = '80';

SELECT user_id, full_name, email, device_name, device_type, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT device_name, device_type, function_name, description, setting_name, setting_value FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id;

SELECT device_name, device_type, function_name, description, log_timestamp, log_message FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;

SELECT device_name, device_type, function_name, description, setting_name, setting_value, log_timestamp, log_message FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id;

SELECT device_name, device_type, function_name, description, setting_name, setting_value, log_timestamp, log_message FROM smart_home_devices JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id WHERE setting_value = 'off';

SELECT full_name, email, device_name, device_type, function_name, description, setting_name, setting_value, log_timestamp, log_message FROM user_profiles JOIN smart_home_devices ON user_profiles.user_id = smart_home_devices.user_id JOIN device_functions ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_functions.device_id JOIN device_settings ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_settings.device_id JOIN device_logs ON smart_home_devices.device_id = device_logs.device_id WHERE log_message LIKE '%alert%';
